title: Symbiosis Architecture – EFC Hybrid Stack
description: ## 1. Overview

title: **Documentation**
description: This directory contains all human-readable documentation for the Energy-Flow Cosmology (EFC) project. It provides a clear overview of theory, methods, meta-architecture, and supporting materials. The structure is designed to align with the semantic layers of the repository and the public metadata endpoints.
